meta.content: Northview Public Schools is an award-winning district in Grand Rapids, MI, known for it's high caliber of its graduates, its staff, and academic programs.
Northview Public Schools | Grand Rapids, MI

Northview Public Schools is an award-winning district in Grand Rapids, MI, acknowledged for the high caliber of its graduates, the high quality of its staff, and the excellence of its academic and co-curricular programs.

p.span: Northview Public Schools is an award-winning district in Grand Rapids, MI, acknowledged for the high caliber of its graduates, the high quality of its staff, and the excellence of its academic and co-curricular programs.

div.p: We are proud of our tradition of dedicated service to students and outstanding parent and community involvement in our programs. Our excellent reputation for high expectations and a responsible and well-disciplined student body makes Northview a truly effective and sought after school district.
